document_data.mainbody:
Sapphire House was an expensive rooming house on Swords Street in the Castle Ward of Waterdeep on the opposite side of the street to Blackstaff Tower.
The inn was a five-story building.
CategoryInns
CategoryLocations on Swords Street
CategoryLocations in the Castle Ward of Waterdeep
CategoryLocations in Waterdeep
